alert.note: Alert for Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pecos and southeastern Reeves Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southeast of Pecos, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coyanosa and B F Goodrich Testing Track. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.
